question: Q1. Which of these keywords can be used to prevent inheritance of a class?
Q2. Which of these is correct way of inheriting class A by class B?
Q3.  Which of these keywords is used to refer to member of base class from a sub class?

answers.a: one class inheriting from more super classes
answers.b: more classes inheriting from one super class
answers.c: more classes inheriting from more super classes

question: Q5. Does a subclass inherit both member variables and methods?

answers.d: Yes--but only one or the other are inherited
